findings.title: Deployer cannot mint after initial deployment
findings.description: The deployer of the contract loses the ability to mint new tokens after the initial deployment.

findings.title: Deployer cannot lock user funds
findings.description: The deployer of the contract does not have the ability to lock user funds.

findings.title: Deployer cannot pause contract
findings.description: The deployer does not have the capability to pause the contract.

findings.title: Deployer cannot burn token
findings.description: The deployer of the contract does not have the ability to burn tokens.

findings.title: Deployer cannot set max transaction amount
findings.description: The deployer of the contract does not have the ability to set a maximum transaction amount.
